name: Short Hop Laser
description:
Short Hop Laser is a Classic arcade 2d shooter with a twist! The only options your character has outside of horizontal movement is to 'short hop' and 'laser'. Hone your Short Hop Laser skills in training mode and then try to get a high score by surviving as long as long as you can!

But be careful, shooting a laser while standing on the ground will have a longer animation than firing in the air. So be quick! Be accurate! and don't forget to fast fall!
